para.text: refer to encoder counts of a Servo Control system, or to 'Steps' of a Stepper-Motor system. The user can set the motion plot in counts, both along the X–axis and the Y–axis.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: It is convenient to set the units to counts when the motion data is to be directly downloaded to a motor system that will accept the data as a series of integer numbers.

para.text: If you wish to save the motion data in counts using the
dialog-box, then you should make sure the data is as follows:
